description:
It seems Wicked City is coming to an end. Beginning Nov. 17, ABC will start airing Shark Tank repeats during the murder drama's timeslot on Tuesday nights. Production on the Ed Westwick and Erika Christensen thriller will cease after Episode 8, which is currently shooting, the network announced on Friday.看来《罪案城市》的故事即将走到结局。从11月17日开始，ABC将会在这部剧原本播出的时间段改播《Shark Tank》。ABC电视台宣布这个消息的时候，这部Ed Westwick主演的罪案剧正在进行第八集拍摄，因此第八集应该也就是这部剧的最后一集了。

ABC hasn't revealed if or when the remaining five episodes would air.ABC电视台暂时还未透露，是否会把剩下的5集播出。

Serial killer stories haven't had the best luck on network TV. NBC just said goodbye to Hannibal this summer.近年美剧界的连环杀手类美剧运气都不太好。NBC也刚刚在今年夏天砍掉了《汉尼拔》。

title: Ed Westwick的新剧才播3集就被砍了
